Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: A round-up of what people are saying across media platforms: AFL's announcement of Gil McLachlan's replacement may be delayed until Federal government reportedly decides on funding of Tasmanian stadium. State Government has high hopes of getting the green light for contentious Macquarie Point stadium. Critics argue that stage 3 tax cuts of Australia are fiscally irresponsible and a costly expense to the country's budget. The Washington State enjoys a budget surplus worth billions of dollars. Other posts discuss the challenges faced with implementing the Treasurer's ideas. And finally some tweets are urging support for the ACT Suburb Zero initiative and remote ovals in Budget 2023.
